title: Visual Copilot and Cursor: Specialized Alternatives
description: While GitHub Copilot and its Agent capabilities provide powerful tools for Figma-to-code conversion, there are specialized alternatives that focus specifically on design-to-code workflows. This section explores Visual Copilot by Builder.io and Cursor, two cutting-edge solutions that can complement or serve as alternatives to the GitHub ecosystem for converting Figma designs to production-ready code.
